title: Ticket #1062: Improve error handling when purging cream jobs
description:
When using the CREAM purge command to tell the server to delete a completed or canceled job, the server will return this error if the job is gone: job does not exist.

The gridmanager should treat this error as a success. Currently, it puts the job on hold.
check_ins: 2009-Dec-15 16:02   Check-in [16669]: Improve error handling when purging cream jobs #1062 If the job is already gone from the server, don't treat it as an error. (By Jaime Frey )
